mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AREA_DEST_PLAN_DETAIL( PLAN_ID, MACHINE_ID, START_TIME, OPERATE_SITE_CODE, OPERATE_USER_CODE ) VALUES( #{planId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{machineId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, NOW(), #{operateSiteCode, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operateUserCode, jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PLAN_ID, MACHINE_ID, MAX(START_TIME), OPERATE_SITE_CODE, OPERATE_USER_CODE FROM AREA_DEST_PLAN_DETAIL WHERE MACHINE_ID = #{machineId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND OPERATE_SITE_CODE = #{operateSiteCode, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND START_TIME <= str_to_date(date_format(#{scannerTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%M-%d %H:%i:%s'), '%Y-%M-%d %H:%i:%s')
